meaning_str.bing:
n. 机场；航空港；航空站
网络. 飞机场；国际机场；小型民用机场

飞机场；国际机场；小型民用机场

机场；飞机场；航空港；空港

sogou-kaoyan.n: 航空站; 机场[出现7次)]

sogou-CET6.n: 航空站; 机场[出现25次)]

sogou-CET4.n: 航空站; 机场[出现29次)]

sogou-gaokao.n: 航空站; 机场[出现4次)]

sogou-zhongkao.cn: 机场; 航空港[出现39次)]

1.en: Boston's Logan International Airport spent more than 30 years trying to overcome community opposition to a new runway.
1.cn: 波士顿Logan国际机场为了修建一条新的跑道，花了30年时间来消除公众的反对。

2.en: Because the airport is often congested, aircraft are frequently directed to circle over the capital, increasing the misery.
2.cn: 因为机场往往“机”满为患，飞机频繁地被告知必须在首都上空盘旋打转，这徒增噪音之大给人们带来的痛苦。

3.en: Airport have to tell you which flight display in which the counter, tickets, identification cards to airport check-in staff.
3.cn: 机场都有显示屏告诉你哪个航班在哪个柜台，将机票、身份证交给机场值机人员。

0.en: What? Newark Airport. Why? Where are you? JFK.
0.cn: 什么？纽瓦克机场，怎么了？你们在哪里？肯尼迪机场。

1.en: This is the airport. Goodbye. Have a lovely holiday.
1.cn: 这是机场。再见！假期愉快。

2.en: This is the airport. Goodbye. Have a lovely holiday.
2.cn: 这是机场。再见！假期愉快。

3.en: Each airport's control tower guides each plane to take off.
3.cn: 每个机场的控制塔能指导每架飞机起飞。

4.en: Yes. Okay, yeah. Off your right side is Teterboro airport.
4.cn: 是的，好了，你右侧有泰特伯勒机场降落。

5.en: You guys. Rachel. Airport, airport. Ross, not alone, Julie, arm around her. Cramp, cramp.
5.cn: 各位！机场，机场，罗斯，不是一个人，茱莉，搂着她！抽筋！抽筋！

6.en: You know you, really didn't have to take me to the airport.
6.cn: 你实在不必送我来机场。

7.en: So I don't need to fetch Stephen from the airport tomorrow?
7.cn: 那明天我不用动身去机场接他了？

8.en: Actually, I have to pick up my friend Justin from the airport.
8.cn: 事实上，我要去机场接我的朋友贾斯汀。

9.en: Hi. Hi. So Emily just went to the airport. Oh. Why didn't you take her?
9.cn: 艾蜜莉去机场了。你怎么不送她去？

10.en: All right, airport's just reopened. I just put Dr. Boswell in a cab.
10.cn: 机场重开了，我把Boswell医生送上出租车了。

11.en: We have to stop her. Before she gets to the airport? No, I mean Claire.
11.cn: 我们得阻止她。在她到机场之前吗？不是，克莱尔。

12.en: Human piloted simulations showed that you could make it back to the airport.
12.cn: 人类飞行员进行的模拟显示，你可以返回机场。

13.en: But this childish test. I was just pulled over on the way to the airport.
13.cn: 但这种幼稚的试探，我刚才在去机场的路上被警察拦下。

14.en: Now you tell her that I'm gonna be at that airport and I hope that she'll be there too.
14.cn: 请你们转告她，我会去机场，我希望她也会去。

15.en: It's still there. Takes me 45 minutes to get through airport security.
15.cn: 到现在还没弄出来，害我每次要耗费45分钟才能过机场安检。

16.en: That's what it says here. Flight 421. Leaves at 8:40. Newark Airport.
16.cn: 这里就是这样写的啊，421航班 8点40起飞，纽瓦克机场。

17.en: It is Mr. Bull in his taxi. He's taking Peppa and her family to the airport.
17.cn: 这是公牛先生和他的出租车。他要带佩奇和她的家人去机场。

18.en: It is Mr. Bull in his taxi. He's taking Peppa and her family to the airport.
18.cn: 这是公牛先生和他的出租车。他要带佩奇和她的家人去机场。

19.en: It was so nice of you to come all the way down to the airport to pick me up. No trouble at all.
19.cn: 你远道来机场接我真是太贴心了。这没什么的。
